content.rendered:
Apple MusicSpotifyYouTube MusicVideo
1Botal Khol (feat. Jasmine Sandlas) - Knox Artiste

Botal Khol (The Baller’s Anthem) is an original track conceptualized, produced and performed by Knox Artiste featuring acclaimed Punjabi vocalist Jasmine Sandlas.

Directed by the multi award winning film maker – David Zennie who has given countless hit music videos such as Brown Rang (Yo Yo Honey Singh), Satisfya (Imran Khan) and many Bollywood features for Shah Rukh Khan, Akshay Kumar & more.

Enjoy the biggest party anthem of 2017 by Knox Artiste!

ALSO AVAILABLE ON:

iTunes – http://bit.ly/Botal-Khol-iTunes

Hungama – http://bit.ly/Botal-Khol-Hungama

Google Play – http://bit.ly/Botal-Khol-Google-Play
